title: Requires banks to install automatic police notification software on their automated teller machines
summary: Requires banks to install automatic police notification software on their automated teller machines.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          567

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. LENTOL -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Banks

       AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to ATM security

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 75-c of the banking law is amended by adding a  new
    2  subdivision 4 to read as follows:
    3    4.  SOFTWARE  THAT  WOULD  ALLOW THE USER TO ENTER HIS OR HER PERSONAL
    4  IDENTIFICATION NUMBER IN A SPECIFIC MANNER THAT WOULD IMMEDIATELY NOTIFY
    5  LOCAL LAW ENFORCEMENT PERSONNEL THAT THE USER  IS  MAKING  A  WITHDRAWAL
    6  AGAINST  HIS  OR  HER  OWN VOLITION, WHILE AT THE SAME TIME ALLOWING THE
    7  AUTOMATED TELLER MACHINE TO DISPERSE MONEY TO THE CUSTOMER AS  IF  THERE
    8  WERE NO PROBLEM.
    9    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
   10  it shall have become a law.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03457-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to ATM security
